title: Humanitarian Response Plan 2023
text:
Here I recreate the table showing Funding of 2023 Response Plans in the Global Humanitarian Overview 2024 using the R packages reactable and htmltools .


The main steps (in the code below) are:

Connect the Humanitarian Data Exchange to download the funding data
Import the data, perform so easy exploration and make minor reformatting of the data
Create a reactable and spend a lot of hours tweaking css to make the following table.














  
  


Humanitarian Response Plans 2023
Funding and Coverage Overview
